ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this course to students who are interested in getting a sense of the way three important scholars think about contemporary issues related to religion and politics.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course introduced me to many different bodies of literature that will further shape my reflection on the topics I'm interested in.

This course exposed me to a number of conversations around religion and politics that will continue to shape my research. Listening to the three instructors present and discuss their work gave me a much better sense of the way people in different fields are thinking about these questions. Through conversations with the instructors, I was able to develop several research ideas that I plan to pursue further.
